text: Almost all my family members have or have had covid in the last 2 weeks. Christmas spike is horrible :/

elements.text: Almost all my family members have or have had covid in the last 2 weeks. Christmas spike is horrible :/

text: Sorry to hear that. I hope they are managing well.

elements.text: Sorry to hear that. I hope they are managing well.

text: So far no heavy cases - but everyday we hear about a friend/family member who got it.

elements.text: So far no heavy cases - but everyday we hear about a friend/family member who got it.

text: Only person in my extended family so far is my Uncle, but he's in pretty bad shape, now 4 weeks out

elements.text: Only person in my extended family so far is my Uncle, but he's in pretty bad shape, now 4 weeks out

text: He's likely out of the woods in terms of dying, but he's got pretty sever cognitive symptoms that seem to be lingering

elements.text: He's likely out of the woods in terms of dying, but he's got pretty sever cognitive symptoms that seem to be lingering

text: Yeah this just isn't funny anymore.

elements.text: Yeah this just isn't funny anymore.

text: My nuclear family has legit dodged covid like the matrix. My dad at least has had 10 or so times where a person he was in close contact with reported back a few days later with covid.

elements.text: My nuclear family has legit dodged covid like the matrix. My dad at least has had 10 or so times where a person he was in close contact with reported back a few days later with covid.

text: Totally possible your dad already had asymptomatic covid, recovered, and is now immune

elements.text: Totally possible your dad already had asymptomatic covid, recovered, and is now immune

text: yeah - we started counting the close calls and seeing if any of us might have had it. I had a weird one day fever that knocked me out for a day and no other symptoms. None of us has had the cough, raspy throught or loss of taste/smell.

text: stupid viruses without easy indicators. wish just your pinky would turn blue for a day or two to let you know or something.
